org.jetel.connection.jdbc.driver

Class JdbcDriverDescription

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jetel.data.PluginableItemDescriptionImpl
      • org.jetel.connection.jdbc.driver.JdbcDriverDescription
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PluginableItemDescription

    public class JdbcDriverDescription
extends PluginableItemDescriptionImpl
    JDBC driver descriptor. This class is a container for all information loaded from 'jdbcDriver' extension point.
